As Tucson allows himself to be scanned, thoughts race actively in his direc=
tory.  He knew his downtime would have to be limited because Hydras was sti=
ll on the loose, and the insectoids had to be dealt with.

" If I may say s=
omething, Stanton, Legacy.  Perceptor has proven his loyalty to us.  He has=
 done many favors which would have cost him his life if he were to be broug=
ht to Hydras now.  To me that takes a lot of courage, and courage is someth=
ing a Maximal and an Autobot are known for.  Let's try to put things behind=
 us, because we have a road ahead of us that is not shy of being perhaps on=
e of our most difficult journeys."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Airshado=
